about_the_game:
Jump straight in and drive the Burlington Northern and Sante Fe GE Dash-9 44CW 'Warbonnet' in 'Easy' or 'Realistic' mode.
BNSF is a Class 1 freight railroad, and the Dash 9-44CW "Warbonnet" is a Top Class new DLC loco from Jointed Rail.

Although the BNSF merger was finalized in 1996, ATSF had 100 C44-9Ws on order. Because of this, #700-799 retained their Dash 9 "Warbonnet" liveries, but received BNSF lettering on the sides as a result of the merger.

  • Build Date: 1993-2004
  • Power Type: Diesel-Electric
  • Engine Type: Four stroke V12 diesel
  • Tractive Effort: 469.9kN Continuous
  • Weight: 425,000lbs
  • Length: 73ft 2in
  • Width: 10ft 3in
  • Fuel Capacity: 5,000 US Gal.
detailed_description:
Jump straight in and drive the Burlington Northern and Sante Fe GE Dash-9 44CW 'Warbonnet' in 'Easy' or 'Realistic' mode.
BNSF is a Class 1 freight railroad, and the Dash 9-44CW "Warbonnet" is a Top Class new DLC loco from Jointed Rail.

Although the BNSF merger was finalized in 1996, ATSF had 100 C44-9Ws on order. Because of this, #700-799 retained their Dash 9 "Warbonnet" liveries, but received BNSF lettering on the sides as a result of the merger.

  • Build Date: 1993-2004
  • Power Type: Diesel-Electric
  • Engine Type: Four stroke V12 diesel
  • Tractive Effort: 469.9kN Continuous
  • Weight: 425,000lbs
  • Length: 73ft 2in
  • Width: 10ft 3in
  • Fuel Capacity: 5,000 US Gal.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: i5 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: i5 2.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics card with 1 GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel 'i' series/AMD K10 series introduced 2009 onwards. 2 physical cores, 2Ghz 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3330/AMD FX 8350 or better, Quad physical core, 64 bit, 2.3Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better/ AMD HD 6950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Jump straight in and drive the BNSF GE Dash-9 44CW Warbonnet in 'easy' or 'realistic' mode.
